Chemical.content:
Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Hydroxytyrosol improved the cardiac disturbances enhanced by doxorubicin by significantly reducing the percentage of altered mitochondria and oxidative damage .

Let's think step by step.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| Hydroxytyrosol |
| Doxorubicin |

In this paragraph, "Hydroxytyrosol" is explicitly mentioned as the chemical entity that improves cardiac disturbances caused by "doxorubicin". Therefore, both hydroxytyrosol and doxorubicin are valid chemical entities in this context.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Chemical" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| Hydroxytyrosol |
| Doxorubicin |

In the original paragraph, "Hydroxytyrosol" and "doxorubicin" are clearly identified as chemical entities. "Improved", "cardiac disturbances", "enhanced", "significantly reducing the percentage of altered mitochondria", and "oxidative damage" do not refer to specific chemicals and are therefore not included in the table.
